channel.title: ComCompetition Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Nick Twort
channel.description: A special podcast focussed on reviewing and analysing New Zealand Commerce Commission reports. Our expert team breaks down complex regulatory information, making it accessible and engaging for listeners interested in competition law, consumer protection, and market dynamics in New Zealand.

item.title: Episode 2: Commerce Commission's Decision on the Foodstuffs Merger
item.itunes:author: Nick Twort
item.description: In this episode, we examine the Commerce Commission's decision to block the Foodstuffs merger and its implications for New Zealand's grocery sector.

item.title: Episode 1: Unpacking the Commerce Commission's Banking Market Study
item.itunes:author: Nick Twort
item.description: In our inaugural episode, we dive into the Commerce Commission's banking market study.
